channel.title: New Player Game Giveaway
channel.description:
Hi everyone! Coin the Newbie Guide here, with a special treat! As everyone knows, I run new player friendly games where our new players can come play with the pros and voice chat to ask questions and get strategy advice in a salt-free environment. Well, I have some Steam codes for the game and a platform, why not do a giveaway? Players of all skill level are welcome, and in post-game chat, I'll roll a 1-16 random number generator, the winner of which will receive a free Steam code for the game to get their friends in! Please sign up using the link below, and keep an eye on the forum and on discord for more information!
https://goo.gl/forms/HCYS3YFha6YLUoB13

item.title: New Player Game Giveaway
item.dc:creator: RedneckHipster
item.description:
I’m still waiting for a full game to do the giveaway. Only had 6 bites so far. Once I get my headset fixed and start streaming newbie games again, I will probably get it filled up.

Read full topic

item.title: New Player Game Giveaway

item.description:
when does it end? i have a friend or two that i’d like to give a code to.
